CustomField.formula: IMAGE( CASE( Distribution_Status__c , "Lead Distributed", "/img/msg_icons/confirm16.png", "Distribution Process Incomplete", "/img/msg_icons/error16.png", "A valid customer needs to be attached to this record", "/img/msg_icons/warning16.png", "/img/msg_icons/error16.png") , "Distribution Flag")
CustomField.label: Distribution Flag
